TITLE: Title
YOU_CAN_ONLY_USE_ALPHABETS_NUMBERS_AND_U: You Can Only Use Alphabets, Numbers And _ Character
LOWERCASE_LETTER_ERROR: Your Password Must Have At Least One Small Letter
CAPITAL_LETTER_ERROR: Your Password Must Have At Least One Capital Letter
NUMBER_ERROR: Your Password Must Have At Least One Number
PASSWORD_LETTER_ERROR: Your Password Must Contain At Least One Uppercase, One Lowercase Letter And One Number.
ENTER_USER_NAME_AND_VERIFICATION_CODE: Enter your Username and your Password
YOU_HAVE_SUCCESSFULLY_LOGGED_IN_TO_YOUR_: You have successfully logged in to your account
MAX_HASH_URL_CHAR_LIMIT: Maximum Hash URL Length is 20 Characters
YOUR_TRACKING_LINK_HAS_BEEN_SUCCESSFULLY: Your tracking link has been successfully created
HOW_IT_WORKS_DESCRIPTION: Use this tracking link instead of the target link(the destination URL). Publish this link wherever you want websites, blogs, email, twitter, facebook, etc...
TEST_IT_NOW_DESCRIPTION: Click on the button below to make sure your tracking link is redirecting to the right destination URL
VIEW_REPORTS_DESCRIPTION: Discover who clicked on this tracking link. Reports will be available only after you get at least one click
